summary: A group of cooks at an asylum for the criminally insane get locked in with the inmates during a massive thunderstorm.
cast: Rupert Evans|Kenny Doughty|Joseph Kennedy|Dave Legeno|Richard Brake|Marcus Garvey|Anna Skellern|Darren Kent|Philippe Résimont|Claude Stark|Chuck Hargrove|Booker T. Franklin|Nina Newman|Bruce Geduldig|Sifiane El Asad|Eric Godon|Vincent Eloy|Karim Barras|Simon Flowerdew|Bruce Ellison|Frédéric Lecointe|Dan Sluijzer|Fabrice Adde|Martin Swabey|Marc Zinga|Ted Fletcher|Jean-Michel Vovk|Ian Lyons|Gaël Maleux|Sandro Mastronardi|Pierre Nisse|Jennifer Baker|Jean-Paul Allonsius|Pascal Blondillo|Michael Fromowicz|Andreas Perschewski|Vicenzo d'Aguanno|Mike Luboya|Gregory Valera|Laurent Sterckx|François Makanga Nyang|Milano Angelo|Arnaud Van Scheventseen|Thomas Gollas|Biondolillo Pascal|Damien Marchal|Michel Webster
title: The Incident
